DOC.brief_title: Studying DNA Tissue Samples From Caucasian African-American Cancer Patients Who Received Docetaxel Clinical Trial CLB-9871
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine genotype ATP-binding cassette , sub-family C ( CFTR/MRP ) , member 2 ( ABCC2 ) solute carrier organic anion transporter family , member 1B3 ( SLCO1B3 ) ( gene potentially relevant pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics docetaxel future ) Caucasian African-American cancer patient enrol clinical trial CLB-9871 . II . Explore relationship genotype docetaxel pharmacokinetic parameter ( e.g. , area curve [ AUC ] , steady-state volume distribution [ Vdss ] ) . OUTLINE : Blood sample collect clinical trial CLB-9871 examine via ABCC2 SLC01B3 genotyping use TaqMan analysis . Other gene relate pharmacokinetics side effect docetaxel may consider future genotyping . In case , panel drug response single nucleotide polymorphism ( SNPs ) high-density array may genotyped .
DOC.criteria: Registration CALGB 9871 Samples present within CALGB Pathology Coordinating Office sufficient meet study aim
